recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-PneumococcalVaccineDecreasePneumoniaRiskShould suggests administration of Pneumococcal vaccine, because administration of Pneumococcal vaccine has: positive contribution to Decrease Pneumonia resulting into having a low risk of developing Pneumonia of Pneumonia ( );

interactionsInformation.explanatoryText: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-IcsIncreasePneumoniaRiskShouldnot which suggests avoiding administration of ICS is considered repairable by http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-PneumococcalVaccineDecreasePneumoniaRiskShould

recommendationsInformation.text: Clinician should recommend administring the Pneumococcal vaccine to decrease the risk of contracting Pneumococcal Pneumonia

value.display: having a high risk of developing Pneumonia
having a low risk of developing Pneumonia

recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should suggests administration of LABA + LAMA, because administration of LABA + LAMA has: positive contribution to Decrease COPD stage resulting into having a moderate COPD stage of COPD stage (A combination of bronchodilators is recommended as initial therapy for patients with  severe breathlessness. Also for patients on monotherapy with persistent breathlessness);

interactionsInformation.explanatoryText: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should which suggests administration of LAMA was considered as a(n) alternative recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should is preferred

http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should which suggests administration of LAMA was considered as a(n) repetition recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should is preferred

http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-SabaLabaIncreaseCRDRiskShouldnot which suggests avoiding administration of SABA or LABA was considered as a(n) contradiction recommendation but http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-LabaLamaDecreaseCOPDStage3Should is acceptable in the presence of http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-SabaLabaIncreaseCRDRiskShouldnot

recommendationsInformation.text: Clinician should recommend administering LABA + LAMA
recommendationsInformation.motivation: A combination of bronchodilators is recommended as initial therapy for patients with  severe breathlessness. Also for patients on monotherapy with persistent breathlessness

value.display: having a severe COPD stage
having a moderate COPD stage

recommendationsInformation.aboutRecommendation: http://anonymous.org/data/RecCOPD-SmokingCessationDecreaseALSShould suggests application of smoking cessation therapy, because application of smoking cessation therapy has: positive contribution to Decrease airflow limitation severity resulting into Having a low airflow limitation severity of airflow limitation severity (Smoking cessation has the greatest capacity to influence the natural history of COPD. If effective resources and time are dedicated to smoking cessation, long term quit success rates of up to 25% can be achieved);
recommendationsInformation.text: Clinician should encourage patient to quit smoking
recommendationsInformation.motivation: Smoking cessation has the greatest capacity to influence the natural history of COPD. If effective resources and time are dedicated to smoking cessation, long term quit success rates of up to 25% can be achieved

value.display: Having a high airflow limitation severity
Having a low airflow limitation severity
